website_summaries.verdict: While this ladder is a little more expensive than others on the market, it is a sturdy and well-made model worth the money.
pros: Stands up to heavy use from the kids
Flat bar on the bottom of this ladder helps keep it level and not sinking into the ground
Can fit round or rectangular trampolines
Adjusts between 33" to 35" in height for a good fit on your trampoline
cons: Assembly is required on this ladder and can be a little tricky

customer_reviews.title: Functions fine, looks "off"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our large trampoline set. Followed all directions meticulously. The bottom plastic caps lasted 1 day before falling off, rolling away and being lost. After a week we stopped putting the end caps back on. The top step is quite tilted. Not sure if that is intentional and if so, why? Would think since the ladder itself is tilted toward the trampoline the steps themselves would lay flat when the ladder is laid at the slight angle. Not quite. All in all, it's better than nothing and my kids are able to maneuver with it. They are 16, 12 and 9.
customer_reviews.author: S F

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder but wish the steps were a little wider and that they were made of a different material. Being that you are barefoot when climbing out of a trampoline, stepping onto the ladder is a bit painful and seems as if you don't have a good balance. Steps Might need to be in a different position. A bit tricky when putting it together with the screw technique.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder for our 15 foot Skywalker trampoline. Not sure why other reviews said it was too tall because it fits perfectly. My 4 and 2 year old kids go up and down with no problems. Also, easy to assemble. Took about 30 mins and it only took that long because my 4 year was helping me assemble it. She was so excited to finally have the ladder. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: happytobfree

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: We've had the ladder and trampoline for a few months now. It has held up to near constant use with our kids and the rest of the neighborhood. It is still in really good condition and even the weather has not affected it. I would recommend it to anyone. I wanted it for added safety to help the smaller children onto the trampoline. It's done it's job and I'm very happy but I will warn you it was hard for me to put together. My husband helped because I couldn't get the screws to line up. It took him no time at all but me? I struggled with it and had to give up after a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Da_Cats_meow

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder - Perfect for our Skywalker Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder - fits perfectly with our 15' Skywalker Trampoline. Kids are able to get in and out of trampoline safely - although there is always adult supervision helping them climb through the net to get onto the ladder. The ladder itself is sturdy and was easy to assemble. I like that the rungs are flat so it's comfy for the kids feet and less chance of slipping. This is a must-have if you are buying a trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: LittleBirdie

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing/quality control
customer_reviews.text: Opened this item and discovered in the first minute of assembly that due to poor manufacturing/quality control they had failed to drill two of the required bolt holes in the bottom footstep. Without these bolt holes there was no way to securely bolt the vertical support post to the bottom step making assembly impossible. Amazon is great and allowed me to return the product. (Five stars ⭐️ to Amazon.) I took a refund over a replacement as I am not convinced of the quality of this product after such a simple oversight.
customer_reviews.author: Shertex

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for 15' Skywalkter Trampolines
customer_reviews.text: This ladder gets 5 stars. It's very sold and the plastic rungs look like they'll last forever and can take the weight of any child and most adults. The foam on the hooks is thick. Overall it seems exceptionally well built. However, be advised that it's 5.5" too tall for the 15' Skywalker trampoline model ATC15G. I made the mistake of listening to other reviewers instead of measuring. My only options now are to cut 5.5" off the bottom of the ladder or send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Good steps, albeit a little long
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only just used for a couple weeks. Only issue I have is that it is too long for the trampoline I have (even though it was recommended with the unit), so it is at quite the angle coming off the edge. Would have been good if there was a hight adjustment capability. Seems like good quality. Fast ship.
customer_reviews.author: looneymoose

customer_reviews.title: Safety Guard -- get it if you have a trampoline!!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid my 3 year old would kill herself using the chair we had next to the trampoline. When I ordered this I was afraid it could be dangerous for her as well as she could fall going up or down this ladder. I bought some mats to go under the ladder in case she did fall. Thankfully, she has never fallen, especially since a BAD storm washed our mats away and placed them in piles of mud I was unwilling to remove from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until top step broke... Less than a year old.
customer_reviews.text: Top rung broke in less than a year. No adult use, just kids under 12. Parts are warranted for just 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder.  Not cheap, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it seems a little pricey for an accessory but it's worth it. You will have to assemble it, but it goes together very easily. The sides are very solid and durable and I really like the flat steps versus the bar steps of most other options. The steps are much easier on little feet and provide more stability.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy ladder that seems to be much better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy ladder that seems to be much better than the one made by our trampoline mfg. After using it for several months, we are very happy we ordered this one. The curve on the brace hooks where it attaches to the trampoline is not perfect but the fact that those hooks have a soft material covering them made it so that you would barely notice since they are hidden by the spring pad anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Fairly Frank

customer_reviews.title: Shipping wasn't great on this item
customer_reviews.text: Shipping wasn't great on this item. 2 of the steps were broken or damaged in original shipping, so I called the company and they are sending replacement steps. JumpSport customer service was great. The ladder was relatively easy to put together and I love the fact it has hooks so I can put it up when I don't want kids jumping on the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: ChristaS

customer_reviews.title: Everything goes together fine with the exception of the screws
customer_reviews.text: I have spent an hour with this thing. Everything goes together fine with the exception of the screws, The nut gets dropped into a tiny hole which is supposed to perfectly align to allow the screw to fit through. 3 out of 6 worked perfectly, but the other 3 will not get into the proper spot and the screw can't make it through. This is beyond frustrating! I'll give myself 30 more minutes and this is getting sent back!
customer_reviews.author: CurleyQ72

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It has made it much easier for our 7 year old and his friends to get onto our trampoline. Even better, our 2-1/2 year old is now able to climb up very easily as well. I saw a couple of negative reviews and can't imagine they have the same ladder - I suspect there were some user errors in assembly. Not only do the kids love it, but my mind is much more at ease from a safety perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use with our Ultega 12' trampoline. The trampoline's pretty high off the ground, and this ladder fits right up against it with enough of an angle that it's not too "steep" for the younger kids. The steps are wide and deep enough and comfortable on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 35' high trampoline. It is very sturdy and was super easy to put together. It stays put and has made it so much easier for my boys 14-2yrs climb in and out of the trampoline safely!
customer_reviews.author: Shopasaurus

customer_reviews.title: ladder seems too long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ladder that was recommended on Amazon for the trampoline we ordered but I feel like its too long. The steps are at an angle that isnt super easy to step on. That being said, it seems well built and we are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alford

customer_reviews.title: GETS THE JOB DONE SHOULD LAST FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the 15 foot Skywalker trampoline. It works OK but the steps are not level for climbing down. The kids don't have problem with it but for adults the steps can be a pain to climb down. It is good quality and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy ladder that fits wonderfully around our thick trampoline frame. My only disappointment with the ladder is with the foam that surrounds the arm hooks. It is easily torn and once gone, it would have a tendency to not stay in place as well. I love the design and especially the ground bar, it prevents the ladder from sinking into the soft ground. Would highly recommend for any trampoline frame size.
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: 8 X 14-Feet and this ladder worked out perfect. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Skywalker Trampolines Rectangle Trampoline and Enclosure with Green Spring Pad, 8 X 14-Feet and this ladder worked out perfect. Great quality, sturdy and good looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new trampoline and then realized that it didn't come with its own ladder. We chose this one and it is so far working just fine. The height is perfect for the trampoline we purchased: Skywalker 14-Feet Square Trampoline and Enclosure. It feels sturdy and is steady when crawling in and out of the trampoline, even for the larger adults. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure if this would be worth the money. Was I wrong...Perfect ladder for our 15 ft trampoline. Much nicer than expected. Very sturdy, love the flat steps. The 3rd step is a plus. Makes it easier and safer for my kids to get out. This ladder was super easy to put together. My 5 year old actually put the steps on and helped tighten the screws....so simple. Love the fact the bolts drop into a tight space so we did not have to "hold" it while tightening the screw. Only one negative...The bolt covers would not go on to cover bolt. (bottom step) No other complaints though...Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melis

customer_reviews.title: Little expensive but...
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is solid. Originally thought I would go cheap and just put a step stool in from of the entrance but soon realized the hazard it presented to my children was not worth it so I made the purchase. I am happy I spent the money. Kids like it, it is solid and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chadillac

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy enough for the grownups to use it to get ...
customer_reviews.text: This has made it so much easier for our younger children to get on and off the trampoline. One of them said that this ladder is "good" and "the best". It is sturdy enough for the grownups to use it to get up and down as well. This beats lifting each child up and then helping them down.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benecke

customer_reviews.title: Came missing several parts
customer_reviews.text: I got this figuring that JumpSport is a better brand. Well the steps came with several missing parts. We also realized that with steps it would allow younger children in out neighborhood to climb up onto out trampoline (we have a two year old living next door that likes to wander over). As our kids don't need it and due to the missing parts we will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: 40 Something Dad

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy...
customer_reviews.text: This little ladder is a perfect height to avoid hitting when jumping. The ladder steps are sturdy and they have all the exposed screws nicely covered to protect against scrapes. I wish the steps themselves were angled better. Whichever way we put them they are not sloped properly, and make climbing or standing on them waiting a turn a bit awkward. Otherwise, it is a great adjustment to the trampoline, and is certainly easier to work with than a 6' ladder.
customer_reviews.author: StevovonE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect for our 15 foot trampoline for our grandkids. Very sturdy and very easy to Put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Leckie

customer_reviews.title: The ladder works but it is overpriced for what you ...
customer_reviews.text: The ladder works but it is overpriced for what you get and the angle is off, should be a few inches longer. Does the job vs kids climbing up
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Was diagnosed with placenta previa and couldn't lift my toddler ...
customer_reviews.text: Was diagnosed with placenta previa and couldn't lift my toddler because of that. This helped get him into the crib during the day for naps when my husband was away.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M Scouras

customer_reviews.title: A good ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Good craftsmanship, but instructions don't mention the washers for the bottom screws, the bottom piece was almost too short, I had to pull and stretch the tubes to fit the ladder tubes, and the bottom "short" screws were too long. I had to put a thick lock washer on both to make up for the length, since I couldn't cut them.
customer_reviews.author: SF&Fan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to put together
customer_reviews.text: Terrible to put together, the tramp was easier than the ladder. Did not send the right part, luckily we had one that worked. Should've returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and find a better ladder. This one isn't adjustable and is too ...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and find a better ladder. This one isn't adjustable and is too long so it's like walking up a ramp instead of a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the kids to get up and down
customer_reviews.author: Knorthey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. Works great with the 15 foot Skywalker trampoline. I hesitated about the price, but it ended up being worth it. It's the "Apple" of trampoline ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Halpin

customer_reviews.title: ITS CONSTRUCTION IS STURDY AND NUMBER OF STEPS MAKE GETTING ONTO AND OFF ...
customer_reviews.text: WELL MADE PRODUCT. ITS CONSTRUCTION IS STURDY AND NUMBER OF STEPS MAKE GETTING ONTO AND OFF A TRAMPOLINE SAFELY.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Akin

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder (doesn't hurt your feet)
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this ladder years ago. My girls (7 & 10) love the ladder, and the fact that it doesn't hurt their feet. Installation was easy and took about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz A. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Better option than the classic metal ladder!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is great! I really love the third step, and the steps are plastic, not metal! It makes it much easier and 'grippier' for my small children when they want to get up and down from it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item is good, but kind of expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It is strong and easy to install. The steps design is good and is not hard on the feet of the little ones. It would have been perfect if it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder.  Not a perfect fit for Skywalker 12ft. Round.
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars only because people said it would fit my 12ft round Skywalker Trampoline, which it does, but not properly. The ladder's steps are angled for a trampoline that is roughly 6 to 8 inches taller then the Skywalker 12ft. Round. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Flipper

customer_reviews.title: Necessity !!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of piling chairs or other flimsy items, we bought this for our 4 kids... 16,12,10 & 8. All 4 (& their friends) use it. Can't imagine having the trampoline without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit... make sure you measure the height of your trampoline as mentioned in other orders. The flat steps over the rounded make for a safer accident free mount and dismount.
customer_reviews.author: Felton G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15ft Round Skywalker. This is the perfect trampoline ladder. It's well constructed. Good durable parts. You do have to assemble it, but that took less than 5 minutes to do. I recommend this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy ladder, much more comfortable and easier to go up/down on than the bar-type rungs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only wish this had a handle for climbing down out of the trampoline
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Try another
customer_reviews.text: This serves purpose but was not easy to put together as nothing really lined up - in fact I am not sure it is actually constructed the way meant.
customer_reviews.author: jld72

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. Looks to be of good quality. I like the step treads for more traction and the padded hooking mechanism to hold to the trampoline better. Will work on a variety of trampoline heights by adjusting the angle of the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: cnash

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder - follow instructions carefully
customer_reviews.text: Assembly can be a bit tricky, follow instructions carefully to save reassembly. It goes on the side of the trampoline easily. It's light enough a 3 year old can carry it out to the trampoline by himself. The steps are wide and feel solid. Overall the ladder feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Overall does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job... but the bottom screws are way too long and are a potential hazard. I had to put in an extra bolt so that it didn't wiggle back and forth and catch on someone's foot or pant leg.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and steps are easy to climb
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and steps are easy to climb. My two year old can scamper up and down this ladder with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: GaGinger

customer_reviews.title: Better than lifting kids up on the trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't we buy this ladder 2 years ago! No more having to lift smaller children onto the trampoline. Durabilty is good after 2 months, but I'm holding off the final star till I've seen it in action longer. Update: After 2 years, this ladder has held up excellently. Definately recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: to long
customer_reviews.text: For likes the look and wide steps as opposed to the steps on the ladder that came with the trampoline. Dislike is it is to long. Will have to make some adjustments to it.
customer_reviews.author: curtis b.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right incline and height for them to climb in and out easy. Slips on and off very easily
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on the Jumpsport Trampoline. Just the right incline and height for them to climb in and out easy. Slips on and off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpacker98

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I wish it had a way to attach it to the frame, so I'll have to come up with something myself. It just has two hooks that go around the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my uneven ground
customer_reviews.text: I choose this model because of the bar at the ground. My trampoline is in a tight space and my yard isn't flat where the entrance to the trampoline is. The flat bar helps keep the ladder stable while being climbed.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: perfect! I bought this for a two and four ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect ! I bought this for a two and four year old and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Khan

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder for our trampoline. Easy on the feet & very study. Just make sure where you attach it at the opening of the net that the ground is as level as possible. This two step ladder was the perfect size for our Skywalker 12' Trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: REF

customer_reviews.title: LADDER IS  MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ladder with the Skywalker Rectangle Trampoline (15-feet). It is our third trampoline over about 15 year, but our first ladder. LOVE THE LADDER. It's a must have. Don't know why it took us so long to realize the ladder is well worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Faglioni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ladder highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this ladder, very sturdy,safe and fits perfect on my 17ft skywalker oval trampoline
customer_reviews.author: cpowell

customer_reviews.title: necessary if you have a trampoline
customer_reviews.text: An absolute necessity if you are buying a trampoline. It is sturdy, we like the flat steps and is one more thing to keep kiddos safe with getting in and out.
customer_reviews.author: prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: My kids give it two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized ladder for our 15' diameter trampoline. It is sturdy and easily place on the trampoline. The steps aren't slipper for little feet and this make exiting and entering much safer and easier.
customer_reviews.author: chey-lo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and solid. Well worth having a ladder for my 7-year old and her friends. Makes getting up on the trampoline so much safer and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerina

customer_reviews.title: Good solid ladder
customer_reviews.text: Item is as advertised; very solid and looks like it should last a good while. This is far superior to the "round-rung" ladders which normally come with trampolines. This is much safer and much easier of little feet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gould

customer_reviews.title: is sturdy, and able to "pull" up so that little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with a trampoline we bought at Toys R Us. Works very well, is sturdy, and able to "pull" up so that little ones can't climb up to the trampoline when not being supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with the Skywalker trampoline we purchased
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with the Skywalker trampoline we purchased. Easy to put together, fits perfectly, love it, so glad we got the ladder to go with the trampoline, it would be super hard for the kids to get on without it!
customer_reviews.author: LISA D THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 and 2 year olds have no problem climbing up and down the ladder. I still stand vigilant, but I highly recommend this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nadar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very Good quality--super fast shipping. My 11 year old put it together while watching a cartoon with no questions. So overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith A Mankowski

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product, you must have one if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a great product, you must have one if you have a trampoline, help to much to avoid accident when kiddos are in a out of the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Product easily assembled and my younger child no longer needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: Product easily assembled and my younger child no longer needs to take a running start to vault onto the trampoline. I have used them as well, so they can support 200ish lbs with ease. Exit can be tricky if not in sitting position, but product works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hillhouse

customer_reviews.title: Please see my review for the Upper Bounce Trampoline Spring ...
customer_reviews.text: Please see my review for the Upper Bounce Trampoline Spring Pull Tool(T-Hook). I haven't seen the JumpSport trampoline Ladder, either, because I had the trampoline and all related equipment shipped directly to a friend for his kids. But as far as I know, everything is working fine
customer_reviews.author: Boyd C. Swingley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for trampolines. Not sure why these don't come with trampolines when you buy them. Or why these are not sold right next to them. Absolutely perfect and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Waits

customer_reviews.title: Holes don't line up
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ladder to go with our SkyWalker trampoline. We have been unable to put it together due to the pre-drilled holes not lining up to the rungs. Total waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: JenEEEEEEE

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Fits our large, square trampoline. Thought I could get away with no ladder until the kids started using things with wheels to climb onto the trampoline. Not good. So I purchased this and it's exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Blmtfish

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and was exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and was exactly what I wanted. Attached right to the side of our trampoline, sturdy and it was easy to assemble. My grandson and his friends had no problem climbing up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Ladder is sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is sturdy and works well. It was a little taller then expected so the angle isn't as steep as I would have liked it climbing up onto the trampoline. Otherwise, though, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: The trampoline needs a ladder and this is a good one but I am rating low because it came ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this ladder for our alley oop but it didn't come with the right size screws. The trampoline needs a ladder and this is a good one but I am rating low because it came with the wrong screws.
customer_reviews.author: HubMom

customer_reviews.title: Get this is you have a trampoline. When yoh ...
customer_reviews.text: Get this is you have a trampoline. When yoh use a little step stool, the kids always fall off. THIS IS WORTH IT AND STURDY
customer_reviews.author: KRIS GOLD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our trampoline. Easy to put together but also very solid. Kids can climb up & down pretty easily, though the 3 year old does have to work at it a bit. Easy on/off.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Our trampoline is not a Jump Sport ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Our trampoline is not a Jump Sport but it works perfect with ours. Very easy to remove and set aside when needed. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Wide Step
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook on and great to climb on. I have a toddler and he easily climbs into the trampoline with this ladder. The steps are nice and wide for him to do it on his own. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: BBMom

customer_reviews.title: 3 steps works great for little ones to use
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect with our Skywalker trampoline. Having the 3 steps is great for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Skinner

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have a trampoline with enclosure.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed and easy to assemble ladder. As a matter of fact my 12 year old daughter put it together properly. It would be very difficult to get onto the trampoline without this, so it is a must have, if you have a trampoline with enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My kids like!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ladder. It's sturdy and a perfect complement to my skywalker rectangle trampoline. The steps are wide and comfy, so the feet don't hurt while climbing. I bought the 3 step one. It's more than others, but worth it. My kids love this ladder and it's a must if you have toddlers and want to avoid them climbing up to the trampoline while pushing themselves up. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Way to Go!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is the best and only "way to go" when getting onto a high trampoline. The wide steps make it easy on the kids' feet and adults' too! This is a well-built, sturdy, and durable ladder. It's easy to assemble. Did my research and bought this item to fit our trampoline, which is not a JumpSport, and it works perfectly. Make sure to measure to exact height to determine whether you need the 2-step or the 3-step. My whole family is pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BonitaC.

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and is very handy for my kids. I am glade I purchased this and I would recommended this to any one it makes getting on and off the trampoline a breeze. Sissy,Avondale ,Wva.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction for adults to enter/exit too
customer_reviews.text: Works well with our Skywalker rectangular trampoline. Sturdy construction for adults to enter/exit too.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and fast to put together
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 15 foot trampoline, he loves having it and so do we. Very easy and fast to put together.
customer_reviews.author: DSad

customer_reviews.title: Great afterthought
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, nice and sturdy. Makes getting in and out so much easier for all the kids. I wish Santa brought this as well when he gave us the trampoline this past Christmas. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Issue with the ladder height. There is too much ...
customer_reviews.text: Issue with the ladder height. There is too much angle which throws the steps off so your feet are not planted squarely on the step. It's functional, just not optimal.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: A great ladder for your trampoline
customer_reviews.text: A great ladder for your trampoline. So much easier for young ones (and old ones) to climb up and down. Safer! Sturdier than your typical trampoline ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for little kids
customer_reviews.text: The three steps are very easy for little kids to use. The steps themselves are soft enough for bare-foot climbups and climb-downs. Took about 10 minutes to assemble. Assembly was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ladder for our skywalker trampoline
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder for our skywalker trampoline. Definitely helps to read the reviews and measure. Ordering and shipping were great. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ladder. Sturdy and well made. Not sure why others have had trouble assembling it, went together quickly and easily. Steps slide right into position, no problem at all. Price was a little steep but I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LaSaundra

customer_reviews.title: Necessary if you buy a trampoline.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the trampoline. All-weather durable. A necessary add to any trampoline purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: A great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is sturdy and once you figure out how to get the nuts into the steps and align the bolts, everything goes together rather quickly. Fantastic ladder.
customer_reviews.author: MissKittyDee

customer_reviews.title: Gets lots of use
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiest trampoline ladder on the market that I have found. High price and high quality, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality ladder! Glad I didn't settle for a cheaper one!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Harvey

customer_reviews.title: ***PARENTS*** THIS IS THE ONE TO GET
customer_reviews.text: I bought a skywalker 15x17 oval trampoline and wanted a ladder to go with it. Skywalker makes one, but has poor reviews because when kids would climb it, their bare feet would because the rungs were thin round metal pipes. THIS has wide steps!!! My 2 & 4 year olds have no problems going up & down it. Neither do i by the way (260lb man). Spend the extra money and buy this. I PROMISE you will be MORE than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Very stable for my two-year-old and four-year-old nice sized steps. Now those flimsy ladders with the tiny steps
customer_reviews.author: Sassydawnb

customer_reviews.title: Hardwear was not included and because we needed this set ...
customer_reviews.text: Hardwear was not included and because we needed this set up in time for a party, we had to go to the hardware store to get the additional supplies we needed to assemble these stairs. Also, the rubber padding at the top was damaged. We think we may have recieved someone else's return even though the description said it was a new ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

product_meta.title: JumpSport SureStep Trampoline Ladder | Powder Coated & UV Treated for Lasting Weather Protection | Sturdy Design, Large, Flat Platform Steps
product_meta.description: Step Up to the Fun! Secure 2-Step Ladder Designed for Trampoline Safety. Fits round, square, and rectangular trampolines 33 to 37 inches in height.
feature_bullets: Safety: Sturdy design with large, flat, platform steps for added safety for all ages and the 2 steps help you safely get on and off your trampoline
37-inch high 2-step ladder and fits most trampolines that stand between 33- and 35-inches tall
Easy to assemble and the non-permanent ladder can be easily added and removed to limit access to the trampoline
Powder coated and UV treated for long lasting weather protection and to protect against all elements
Fits JumpSport series: SkyBounce (all models), JumpSport Classic (all round models), JumpSport Elite (all models), AlleyOOP VariableBounce (all round single-bed models)
